channel.description: Recent content in multiculturalism on Zinzy's website

item.title: On the misfortunes of yesterday
item.description: It’s Gay Pride today. Yesterday, as N and I were on our way to the cinema, somebody yelled “DYKES!” at us. I dislike such antics as much as the next gay. I don’t like the words “dyke” and “fag” and the stigma surrounding homosexuality. Since we’re alive in the modern world of 2009, I always fervently hope that people know better by now. I’m lucky enough to live in an environment with friends and family who support me.
